en.title: Dealing with Cat Shedding Season: Care Tips to Reduce Hair Loss and Cleaning Tricks
en.content:
Cat shedding season mainly occurs in spring (winter coat to summer coat) and autumn (summer coat to winter coat). Long-haired breeds like Siberians shed particularly heavily during these periods.

Shedding Season Care

Daily Brushing

During shedding season, daily brushing is ideal. A Furminator is especially effective for efficiently removing the undercoat.

Shampooing

Shampooing during shedding season can remove a large amount of loose undercoat at once. However, frequent shampooing can cause dry skin, so limit it to about once per shedding season.

Indoor Cleaning

Using a robot vacuum, setting up an air purifier, and keeping lint rollers handy are all recommended. Placing washable covers on your cat's favorite lounging spots is also effective.

zh.title: 猫咪换毛期应对方法：减少掉毛的护理与清洁技巧
zh.content:
猫咪的换毛期主要在春季（冬毛换夏毛）和秋季（夏毛换冬毛）到来。尤其是像西伯利亚猫这样的长毛品种，这个时期的掉毛量会非常大。

换毛期的护理

每日梳毛

换毛期理想状态是每天梳毛。去底绒梳（Furminator）在高效去除底层绒毛方面特别有效。

洗澡

换毛期洗澡可以一次性去除大量多余的底层绒毛。但频繁洗澡会导致皮肤干燥，建议每个换毛期只洗一次左右。

室内清洁

建议使用扫地机器人、安装空气净化器、常备衣物粘毛器。在猫咪经常休息的地方铺上可水洗的布套也很有效。
